_header: The garland that of thorn is wrought
_description: The Wounds as remedies against the Seven Deadly Sins — seven 8-line stanzas (ababcdcd) in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Þe garlond þat of þorn is wrothan stikid on my
                    crune…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Þi glotoniȝe so sal ben wenchtIf þu
                    þeroffe wilt þinke
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 49-51.
